excerpt.rendered:
• High Purity 2% Lugol’s Iodine
  • Made using state of art equipment without use of plastic and metals.
  • To be used for high end applications that requires high purity materials with zero heavy metals.
  • Supplied in premium imported amber glass bottles with glass dropper
